price: Umubwire uti “Ese ushobora kwiyeza (ukareka icyaha cy’ubuhakanyi, ukaba umwemeramana)?”
arabic: فَقُلۡ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: faqul hal laka ilā an tazakkā
